name: Greaves
description:
A basic prototype for a topdown shooter, made in a day,  needs a lot of features.

The player can fall off the map, fixing that next, I just wanted to try the upload feature.

----------------------

Keyboard Controls:

WASD: Move Character

Mouse movement: Moves targeter

Left Click: Shoot

----------------------

Controller:

Left Analog: Move Character

Right Analog: Aim

Right Trigger: Shoot

-----------------------
